about_the_game:
Tyler Warren’s 11th set of monster graphic assets is here! This beautifully drawn pack of monsters is perfect to use in your next project. The running theme of this pack is little monsters and robots. This is part 2 of 2 and includes 40 original monsters in multiple formats; ready to plug and play in your RPGMaker projects. Use these graphics for battles, detailed cut scenes, story development, dialog, titles and much more. Combined this pack with the massive library of Tyler Warren’s monsters to mix and match over 500+ monsters.


This monster pack includes:

* 40 original monsters crafted around the theme of Little Monsters and Robots
* Each monster comes in/with:
* Multiple sizes for use across different engines (Raw, LargeMV, Large, Mid, Small, and Tiny)
* A noise filtered version for a “smooth” illustrative graphic look (also in similar sizes)
* Matching facesets in both “MV/MZ” and “VX ACE” sizes
* A Pixel-Style version in 9 color palettes: GameBoy (4 color), NYX8 (8 color), AAP 64 (64 color), NES (55 color), DB-ISO (22 color), Matriax (128 color),
TimeFantasy (120 color), TimeFantasy (192 color)
* Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ, MV, VX Ace, and other RPG Makers


Add these to Tyler’s other battlers and fill your library with 500+ exciting characters for your next RPG Maker Project!

Credit Tokiwa Graphics and Joel Steudler for the awesome battle backgrounds used in the title and screenshots and FinalBossBlues for the character sprites.


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
